name: Frametime
description:
This is my Ludum Dare 33 entry. The LD33 page is here because you like voting for games.

By the way, you will need a PlayStation emulator to run this.

Source code is on GitHub (link is for the LD33 release commit):

https://github.com/fanzyflani/ld33/tree/6b5efdade2...

Controls:

  • Arrows to turn your plane
  • L1/R1 to strafe
  • X to rocket boost
  • Square to shoot
  • Start to restart the level

Default mappings for Mednafen in the win32 bundle (double-click on run.bat)

  • WASD to turn your plane
  • Numpad1/Numpad3 to strafe
  • Numpad2 to rocket boost
  • Numpad4 to shoot
  • Enter to restart the level
